data.1: I CALL THE night to witness when it covers over,
data.2: And the day when it shines in all its glory,
data.3: And Him who created the male and female,
data.4: That your endeavour is for different ends.
data.5: Yet he who gives to others and has fear,
data.7: We shall ease the way of fortune for him.
data.8: But he who does not give and is unconcerned,
data.10: For him We shall ease the way of adversity,
data.11: And his riches will not avail him when he falls headlong (into the Abyss).
data.12: It is indeed for Us to show the way,
data.13: And to Us belong the End and the Beginning.
data.14: So, I warn you of the blazing Fire.
data.15: No one will burn in it but the most wretched,
data.16: Who denied (the truth) and turned away.
data.18: And gives of his wealth that he may grow in virtue,
data.19: And is under no one´s obligation to return his favour,
data.20: Other than seeking the glory of his Lord, most high,
